text: **Interest in property acquired, acquisition of land, construction of building and supply of machinery, etc.**

Except certain premises which have been leased by our Promoters to our Company and certain premises that have been sold by our Company to our Promoters and disclosed in the tables below, our Promoters have no interest in any property acquired, whether direct or indirect, by our Company, during the three years preceding the date of the Draft Red Herring Prospectus or proposed to be acquired by our Company, or in the transactions for acquisition of land, construction of building or supply of machinery.
